Examples

import { Aside, Tabs, TabItem, Steps } from “@astrojs/starlight/components”;

Overview

Các examples thực tế về cách sử dụng ltvai-kit trong daily development.

Complete Workflows

New Feature: User Authentication

  1. Brainstorm the feature

    Output: brainstorming-oauth2-auth-1801261400.md

    Spec contains:

    • Architecture diagram
    • OAuth flow sequence
    • Data models (User, Session, Provider)
    • Implementation tasks

  2. Review the spec (optional)

    Read through .claude/.specs/brainstorming-oauth2-auth-1801261400.md

    Check:

    • Architecture makes sense
    • Tasks are complete
    • No missing requirements

  3. Implement

    Claude will:

    • Create auth module structure
    • Implement OAuth providers
    • Add session management
    • Create UI components

  4. Review implementation

    Get:

    • Security score
    • Vulnerability findings
    • Recommendations

Bug Fix: Payment Failure

  1. Debug the issue

    Output: debugging-payment-invalid-card-1801261500.md

    Spec contains:

    • Reproduction steps
    • Root cause analysis
    • Fix options

  2. Review RCA

    Check the Root Cause Analysis:

    • Is the root cause identified?
    • Are fix options viable?
    • Any risks to consider?

  3. Implement fix

    Claude will:

    • Apply recommended fix
    • Run verification steps
    • Update spec status

  4. Verify fix

    Test the payment flow manually to confirm fix works.

Code Quality: Refactor Service

  1. Analyze code smells

    Output: refactoring-orderservice-decomposition-1801261600.md

    Spec contains:

    • Smell catalog
    • Migration plan
    • Characterization tests

  2. Review migration plan

    Check:

    • Is the plan safe?
    • Are tests adequate?
    • Can we roll back if needed?

  3. Implement refactoring

    Claude will:

    • Follow migration plan
    • Keep tests GREEN
    • Split into focused services

  4. Verify behavior

    Run full test suite to ensure behavior preserved.

Quick Examples

Feature Development

``` /brainstorming Add a "Remember Me" checkbox to login form ```
``` /brainstorming Design a real-time notification system with: - WebSocket connection management - Notification preferences per user - Push notifications for mobile - In-app notification center ```
``` /brainstorming Design REST API endpoints for product management: - CRUD operations - Filtering and pagination - Bulk operations - Versioning strategy ```

Bug Investigation

``` /debugging App crashes with "Cannot read property 'map' of undefined" when loading dashboard after logout ```
``` /debugging Cart total shows wrong amount when applying discount code twice in succession ```
``` /debugging Dashboard takes 10+ seconds to load after adding the new analytics charts ```

Code Review

``` /reviewing Review PR #234 adding user profile editing ```
``` /reviewing Security audit the authentication and authorization modules ```
``` /reviewing Check code quality of the new payment integration before release ```

Refactoring

``` /refactoring UserController has 2000 lines handling auth, profile, settings, and notifications ```
``` /refactoring Similar validation logic repeated in RegisterForm, ProfileForm, and SettingsForm ```
``` /refactoring PaymentService directly accesses OrderService and UserService internals ```
